metadata.name: ItemJam Vol. 1
metadata.description:
[h1] ! REPENTOGON IS REQUIRED ! [/h1]
[h2] 9 New Items! [/h2] ModJam was a contest hosted by me, ConBoi, to challenge people to make a singular new item over the course of a week. I was able to get 9 submissions by the following talented people:
Glitched Miner - Monwil Mega Dice - Foks Holy Hamsa - Stale Floast Hat - Kerkel, Split Strange Mask - Spoop Hexagonal Core - Aeronaut, Truji Bucket Of Boots - 4Head, Skulldier Dad's Savings - Kattack, Chuz Hornpipe - John Sorrow
Special thanks to Kerkel for compiling all of the mods into one big modpack.
